Title: Che: Part One
Writer: Peter Buchman (screenplay), Ernesto 'Che' Guevara (memoir "Reminiscences of the Cuban Revolutionary War")
Actors: Julia Ormond, Benicio Del Toro, Oscar Isaac, Pablo Guevara
Plot: In 1956, Ernesto 'Che' Guevara and a band of Castro-led Cuban exiles mobilize an army to topple the regime of dictator Fulgencio Batista.
Production: Telecinco Cinema, Guerrilla Films Inc., Morena Films
